name: InVerseReaction
description:
Oh no!,ghosts have got into your alchemy ingredients and ruined your prize winning flow  find a way to change it back ,a small game demonstrating a crafting system, figure out which potion has the opposite reaction to the flowers effect. and grab and splat a few ghosts if they appear. the game isn't what i wanted it to be as i ran out of time and am having headset issues and have to work and a few hours but i can always make it what i want it to be later there is probably quick a bit that needs to be tweaked you win some you lose some

the crafting slots are on the side of the crafter put the ingredients in a press the button for the potion you want recipes are as follows

Leftside+Rightside

V                        V

coffee + coffee =fire

ice + ice = ice

Waste + coffee =stone

battery + marshmellow =storm
